name: Grow dot, grow
description:
Hello! this is my first game ever!

I took inspiration from Polka Dot Game and I just added some of my own features. Hope you'll like them.

More updates might come out.

List for next possible updates:

  1. Shop - When eating dots, it counts up your score, the score will be saved and will be converted to currency which you can use to buy colors for the enemies as you like, maybe designs for the Player and maybe new Background Colors.

Any suggestion will be useful! thank you so much for checking out my first game I ever finished.
